body.name: SAMSUNG 43-Inch Class Crystal UHD CU7000 Series Bluetooth PurColor Object Tracking Sound Lite Q-Symphony 4K Upscaling HDR10 Gaming Hub Smart TV with Alexa Built-in UN43CU7000(Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 4K - True-to-life color. Effortless connectivity. Dazzling 4K value. Samsung Crystal UHD is worth a look (and more). Effortlessly access TV shows, movies and ambient content using the Samsung Smart Hub, or find a range of great games on the Samsung Gaming Hub. ¹ Enjoy content even more clear than it was created as it’s upgraded to 4K resolution

PurColor - Perceive a wider spectrum of colors than traditional RGB models with PurColor. From the green turf on the football field to an amazing sunset straight from the big screen, you’ll enjoy true-to-life picture quality with our innovative color technology that electronically adjusts and optimizes the colors on screen.

When good enough isn’t Crystal Processor with 4K UHD Upscaling Watch the content you love upgraded to dazzling 4K resolution. You’ll be able to better enjoy your TV’s capabilities as the Crystal Processor automatically transforms color, sound and more. Even if the content you’re watching wasn’t produced in 4K, you can enjoy it like it was.

Motion Xcelerator - Stay cool in the driver’s seat. Don’t let the action pass by in a blur. Now you can fuel your need for speed with high-intensity sports, movies and games, and enjoy crisp and clear details at the same time. The picture on-screen moves smoothly as motion performance features make automatic adjustments so you don’t miss a thing.

Mega Contrast HDR - Every frame appears more natural, and a feeling of depth is added as contrast is dialed up in the foreground. Incredible details are revealed, drawing your eyes to the most important parts of whatever you’re watching.
body.description: Game all day Samsung Gaming Hub - Where gaming comes together.¹ Stream your favorite games right from your TV. No console required.³ Sounds like a good time Object Tracking Sound Lite - Get in the mix with Object Tracking Sound Lite. You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio. Redefining the dynamic duo Q-Symphony - Amp up your audio with the greatest duo of all time—Samsung TVs paired with a Samsung soundbar. With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one. Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience Enjoy deep black, vivid color and rich detail that brings your picture to life. From sports, games and more to the latest Hollywood film, enjoy their striking beauty with UHD Dimming technology. Samsung Smart TV Hub Finding what everyone wants to watch is effortless with the easy-to-use Samsung Smart TV Hub. Movies, TV show and games are all available on a home screen tailored to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible, as soon as I unboxed and turned on I got these crazy screens
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Have to keep pressing power button to turn on, randomly shuts down and has glitches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Maybe I'm crazy?
reviews.reviewText: Perhaps I'm crazy but I could've sworn this product said it was 120hz on refresh rate. Hook it up to my pc to get it's diagnostics, it's only 60hz! And it's not HDR certified! What the heck!?
